statements: SELECT id, conversion_rate, average_order_value FROM KPIs
SELECT average_order_value, id, conversion_rate FROM KPIs
SELECT * FROM KPIs WHERE conversion_rate > 0.5
SELECT id, average_order_value FROM KPIs WHERE average_order_value < 100
SELECT conversion_rate, average_order_value FROM KPIs ORDER BY conversion_rate DESC
SELECT id, conversion_rate, average_order_value FROM KPIs WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM KPIs WHERE conversion_rate > 0.5 ORDER BY average_order_value DESC;
SELECT id, conversion_rate, average_order_value FROM KPIs ORDER BY conversion_rate ASC;
SELECT AVG(conversion_rate), MAX(average_order_value) FROM KPIs;
SELECT COUNT(id) AS total_records FROM KPIs;
SELECT * FROM conversion_rates WHERE conversion_count > 10;
SELECT customer_id, total_visits FROM conversion_rates ORDER BY total_visits DESC;
SELECT customer_id, conversion_count FROM conversion_rates WHERE customer_id = 100;
SELECT customer_id, total_visits FROM conversion_rates WHERE total_visits < 5 ORDER BY customer_id ASC;
SELECT order_id, order_value FROM order_values WHERE order_value >= 1000 ORDER BY order_value DESC;
SELECT customer_id, conversion_count FROM conversion_rates WHERE total_visits > 100 ORDER BY customer_id DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM conversion_rates WHERE conversion_count > 10 AND total_visits < 50 ORDER BY conversion_count ASC,total_visits DESC;
SELECT customer_id, SUM(order_value) AS total_order_value FROM order_values GROUP BY customer_id HAVING total_order_value > 1000 ORDER BY total_order_value DESC;
SELECT customer_id, AVG(conversion_count) AS avg_conversion FROM conversion_rates GROUP BY customer_id HAVING avg_conversion < 5 ORDER BY avg_conversion ASC;
SELECT customer_id, conversion_count, total_visits FROM conversion_rates WHERE customer_id IN (SELECT customer_id FROM order_values WHERE order_value > 1000) ORDER BY customer_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM conversion_rates ORDER BY conversion_date DESC;
SELECT conversion_date, conversion_value FROM conversion_rates WHERE conversion_value > 100;
SELECT kpi_id, kpi_name FROM kpis WHERE kpi_value < 5.0;
SELECT order_id, order_date, order_amount FROM order_values ORDER BY order_amount ASC;
SELECT * FROM conversion_rates WHERE conversion_date = '2022-01-15';
SELECT * FROM conversion_rates ORDER BY conversion_id DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT kpi_name, AVG(kpi_value) FROM kpis GROUP BY kpi_name;
SELECT conversion_date, AVG(conversion_value) FROM conversion_rates WHERE conversion_date > '2022-01-01' GROUP BY conversion_date;
SELECT order_id, order_amount, order_date FROM order_values WHERE order_amount > 1000 ORDER BY order_date ASC;
SELECT kpi_name, MAX(kpi_value) FROM kpis GROUP BY kpi_name ORDER BY MAX(kpi_value) DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM user_analytics
SELECT user_id, user_name, user_email FROM user_analytics
SELECT user_name, user_email, user_id FROM user_analytics
SELECT user_email, user_name FROM user_analytics
SELECT user_email, user_id FROM user_analytics
SELECT * FROM conversion_rates WHERE user_id = 123 ORDER BY conversion_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT user_name, user_email FROM user_analytics WHERE user_name LIKE 'John%' ORDER BY user_id ASC;
SELECT MAX(order_amount) AS max_order_amount, MIN(order_amount) AS min_order_amount FROM order_values WHERE order_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT kpi_name, AVG(kpi_value) AS avg_kpi_value FROM kpi_analysis GROUP BY kpi_name HAVING AVG(kpi_value) > 50;
SELECT user_id, SUM(conversion_value) AS total_conversion_value FROM conversion_rates GROUP BY user_id HAVING SUM(conversion_value) > 1000;
SELECT * FROM KPI_conversion_rates;
SELECT customer_id, conversion_rate FROM KPI_conversion_rates ORDER BY customer_id DESC;
SELECT result_description FROM KPI_analysis_results WHERE id = 2;
SELECT parameter_name, parameter_value FROM KPI_analysis_parameters WHERE analysis_id = 1;
SELECT log_timestamp, log_details FROM KPI_calculation_logs ORDER BY log_timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM KPI_conversion_rates ORDER BY conversion_rate DESC;
SELECT customer_id, conversion_rate FROM KPI_conversion_rates WHERE customer_id = 1001;
SELECT result_description, analysis_id FROM KPI_analysis_results WHERE result_description LIKE '%important%';
SELECT * FROM KPI_order_value ORDER BY order_value ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT parameter_name, parameter_value FROM KPI_analysis_parameters WHERE analysis_id = 2001;
